about_the_game:
Join the game community on Discord:


Use democracy as an instrument and defeat your opponents with strategic moves! Take your place at a table where everything can be done for victory in the power struggle. You are faced with a political party management game, inspired by the political atmosphere of the 1970s and 1980s, enriched with humor elements. In this game, shape your country with clever strategies and political maneuvers and get ahead in the leadership race.

Country Balance

Tired of gray routines and low-yield moves? Then it’s time to shake your country a bit! Rise in the midst of chaos, but be on guard against the risk of getting lost in this chaos! As you change the situation of the country from beginning to end, use the advantage of chaos with the most effective strategies.

Come to Power

Did you lose the elections? Don’t worry, you have alternatives like civil war and coup; just be a good politician.

Change the Management

Democracy is dead; would socialist dictatorship or theocracy interest you? It’s free to try! In Statecraft, there are many management systems and game endings.

Make Allies

You can agree with players or radical groups in the country. Just make sure you watch your back.

Politicize the Apolitical

Does too much vote harm? Turn the apolitical in the regions into your own supporters. You can eliminate opposing groups by organizing intrigues.

War

Have you taken over the management of the country? Why not enlarge your country by taking land from neighbors? Now it’s time to color the map.

name: Statecraft: Corrupted Democracy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Statecraft is a game that adds humor to political party management. In the atmosphere of the 70s and 80s, shape your country, defeat your opponents, come to power. Fight, stage a coup, make allies. Statecraft invites you to the exciting and corrupt world of politics.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
